hadiths.text: This Tradition has been reported by Abu Hurairah through another chain of transmitters. It adds :“ twice or thrice.” This version does not mention Abu Razin

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الرَّجُلِ يُدْخِلُ يَدَهُ فِي الإِنَاءِ قَبْلَ أَنْ يَغْسِلَهَا
chapter.eng-name: A Man Putting His Hand In The Container Before Washing It
